task:
Task:
  The response compares two or more subjects, highlighting relationships such as similarities, differences, or tradeoffs.
constraints: Completeness ("full"): The response provides a thorough answer for normal use, covering all major aspects without needing every micro-detail.
Directional ("fog"): The response modifies the task to identify general patterns and abstract principles from the specifics, moving from particular cases to broader insights.

hydrated_constraints.description: The response provides a thorough answer for normal use, covering all major aspects without needing every micro-detail.
The response modifies the task to identify general patterns and abstract principles from the specifics, moving from particular cases to broader insights.

hydrated_persona.description: The response speaks as a product manager, focusing on outcomes, scope, and stakeholders.
The response addresses the team, keeping the guidance actionable and collaborative.
The response uses a kind, warm tone.
